item.title: Nopaste.vim update
item.author: nikolavp@gmail.com (Nikola Petrov)
item.description: Today i posted an improved version of nopaste in the scripts database at vim.org You can find the script here. It will help you paste code/text in rafb.net/paste to use it on IRC or some other chat programs. For me it was really useful so i made it public.
